thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Margaret Hayhurst
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Margaret Hayhurst

author: Margaret Hayhurst
title: Margaret Hayhurst
text:
We enjoyed our trip to New Zealand despite recent earthquake damage there, cancelling our route via scenic rail on the East Coast , fires in the tunnels altering our tip by rail into Arthur's pass , huge forest fires limiting our tour of the outreaches of Christchurch...(after sadly touring their existing earthquake damage) and fog cancelling our air trip back from Milford Sound to view the mountains.. Be prepared to be flexible. !! Goway did a good job !
Would not recommend stopping in Blenheim to view the wine country. While our bike trip through the vineyards was very short but well run, the town itself is just a farming outpost..no charm , and our hotel The Hotel D'Urville located in the middle of a depressed business district, was billed as "charming" ,but filled with uncomfortable antique furniture and worn carpets. We were very disappointed when management bumped us for a pre booked 8PM dinner downstairs after our arrival, as they were hosting a large catered $$group.
